changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE maintenance_history ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, idMaintenance INTEGER NOT NULL, idOriginEmployee INTEGER NOT NULL, idDestinationEmployee INTEGER NOT NULL, redirectDate TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, reason VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (idMaintenance) REFERENCES maintenance(idMaintenance), FOREIGN KEY (idOriginEmployee) REFERENCES employee(idEmployee), FOREIGN KEY (idDestinationEmployee) REFERENCES employee(idEmployee) );
